attributes.action: Please Restrict the sale and use of Fireworks to organised displays and events
attributes.additional_details: Every year our Pets are suffering terrified from the ridiculous amount of Fireworks let off, they are dangerous and are the cause of accidents even death please sign my partition and reduce Firework Sales to organised events and licensed display organisers.
attributes.background: Every year our Pets and other Animal Wildlife are terrified by the use of Fireworks mainly from back garden displays or unorganised events. In this day and age the sale of explosives such as fireworks must be restricted to organised events in remote areas to licensed organisers only.
